title: When you are in your promos, so you sacrifice Teemo to the Rito gods for good luck
body:
http://i.imgur.com/LyRPUUX.gif?noredirect

Legends say that if you sacrifice a Yordle, your team won't have an afk all day

replies.body:
Ima... ima just gunna stay outa this.
https://media.giphy.com/media/12NRD7WwZGDiJa/giphy.gif
IT'S A TRAP. YOU WON'T HAVE ANY AFK'S, BUT YOU WILL HAVE DUOS THAT INTENTIONALLY FEED THEN REFUSE TO SURRENDER!!!!

The Riot gods?
You are praying to the wrong gods. The MMR / LP gods are who you should REALLY be praying too.

MMR/LP gods? Don't you mean RNGesus?

_Seinfeld Theme ensues_
Where's the {{champion:150}} groupie dance off to the side?
But if you sacrifice Teemo, all the Yoricks will worship you... Or maybe kill you because you put them out of business.
What are you talking about? Yorick is a gravedigger.  Clearly giving him dead bodies is like giving other people chocolates.
But the corpse will be incinerated so he won't have anything to bury.

> [{quoted}](name=Fondling Gems,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=rEn2tvlc,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-08-14T06:42:21.519+0000)
>
> What are you talking about? Yorick is a gravedigger.  Clearly giving him dead bodies is like giving other people chocolates.

But {{champion:83}} only digs {{champion:104}}
Sacrifice? more like a burden lifted.
New post...old gif. this is the season 4 map lol
